es_EC {
    CurrencyElements { 
            "S/",
            "ECS",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss a z",
            "hh:mm:ss a z",
            "hh:mm:ss a",
            "hh:mm a",
            "EEEE d' de 'MMMM' de 'yyyy",
            "d' de 'MMMM' de 'yyyy",
            "dd/MM/yyyy",
            "dd/MM/yy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    LocaleID { "300a" }
    LocaleString { "es_EC" }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: NumberElements */
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;\u00A4-#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "ECU" }
}
